content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "mossy_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 29, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 16, "index": 14}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 49, "index": 27}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 19, "index": 33}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 38}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft an acacia_fence_gate, I need to place 1 stick, 2 acacia_planks, and 1 stick in the crafting grid in the shape shown above. Therefore I will first move a stick from slot 38 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 29, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 16, "index": 14}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 49, "index": 27}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 19, "index": 33}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 38}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that the stick has been moved to slot 1, I need to move the acacia_planks to the right of it. Therefore I will move 1 acacia_planks from slot 39 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: Now that the acacia_planks have been moved to slot 2, I need to move the second stick to the right of it. Therefore I will move 1 stick from slot 38 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 3 with quantity 1

thought: Now that the second stick has been moved to slot 3, I need to move the third stick below it. Therefore I will move 1 stick from slot 38 to slot 4.

inventory=[{"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 29, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 16, "index": 14}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 49, "index": 27}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 19, "index": 33}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
